name: Spin Impact
description:
Spin Impact is a Compo game made for Ludum Dare 50.

Spin the hammer!

How to play:
  • Destroy the boosters to spin the hammer.
  • Destroy the enemies with the hammer.
  • Do not let the enemies touch the drone.
  • Have fun!
Default controls:

  • W/Up Arrow - Move forward
  • S/Down Arrow - Move backward
  • A/Left Arrow - Move left
  • D/Right Arrow - Move right
  • Gamepad Left Stick - Move
Have fun!
